item.title: Answer from French anticorruption association Anticor related to the McDonald’s case.
item.description:
Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2019-09-27_1721_0800_french_anticorruption_association_anticor_replies.pdf

From: Expertise juridique Anticor (a famous French anticorruption NGO) <expertisejuridique@anticor.org>
Subject: Re: Does Article 40 of the French Criminal Procedure Code apply to a member of the French Parliament?
Date received: September 27, 2019, 17:21 +0800
To: Vincent B. Le Corre
